oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Les manufactures d'étoffe en Egypte au moyen âge : communication faite à l'Institut égyptien dans la séance du 6 avril, 1903.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Short book describing the medieval textile industry in Egypt. The covers and endpapers were not digitized.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Textile industry -- Egypt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain.
